sentences.sentence: Ever since Einstein, physicists have been telling us that time—this steady tick-tock of the universe—is much weirder than we think.
sentences.translation: 自从爱因斯坦以来，物理学家们一直告诉我们，时间——这个宇宙稳定的滴答滴答声——远远比我们想象的还要神奇。

sentences.sentence: But, this one is a lot weirder.
sentences.translation: 但是这个就显得比较怪异了。
在那里，事情变得更加不可思议。
